---
description: Generate a blameless incident postmortem from an incident
agent: agent
---

Generate a blameless postmortem for the following incident. Use the oncall agent if available.

Gather:
1. Incident title, severity, and duration
2. Timeline of events (ask for details if not provided)
3. Impact: users affected, revenue impact, SLO breach
4. Root cause and contributing factors
5. What went well, what went wrong
6. Action items with owners and due dates

Output a complete postmortem in the standard format:
- Summary (2-3 sentences)
- Timeline table
- Root cause
- Contributing factors
- What went well / what went wrong
- Action items table
- Lessons learned

Keep it blameless â€” focus on systems and processes, not individuals.
